name: Vox Populi Vox Dei 2
description: Your adventure is not over yet, the real enemy has appeared. Dr. Wolf has taken your lovely girl and you won't stop until you find her. To accomplish your mission, you will pass through many difficult challenges, putting your own life at risk.

reviews.review_text: Nope.. the original one is waaayy better than this. If you are looking for an effing hard platformer with tight controls but still fun to play with, for your sake please play the Super Meat Boy instead of this. Don't get me wrong, i do like if a game punishing me with some hard obstacles. But the challenges in this game aren't rewarding at all! And the story.. the atmostphere.. aren't engaging enough to keep me continue my playthrough.  Stomping and shredding the werewolf was fun and satisfying. It really was.. and then come this sequel..
BACK TO THE 90`s!  Had a great time with that game.  stunning soundtrack and always up for surprises.  more please!

You think Super Meat Boy is hard? Give this a go. It can get repetitive at times but it looks amazing and has such a great feel to it. Short game though, beat it in only two hours. I'd say get it on sale when its under a dollar.   The voice of the people is the voice of God    9 / 10
Way too hard, thought it'd be fun and casual like episode 1 but nah

Nice and short platformer. The atmosphere is pretty weird, a strange doctor wolf kidnaps what appears to be your son and you have to rescue him. The plaform controls are pretty good, I died a lot but there were no cheap deaths, mostly my mistakes. The only section I wish they would change is when you fly on a bird and the game becomes sort of shoot 'em up, the bird moves painfully slow and it's impossible to dodge anything. Controls are pretty good, I heard people complaint about them, but I quite liked them.
Buy this now is so fun and creative. you will stun at all of boss fight i hate wolf/10
I loved the original game. So i decided to get this game and now I am getting used to the new gimicks This game is byotiful
This game may not have great graphics but it is the thrilling sequel of Vox Populi Vox Dei 1 free on the internet and it has great gameplay and new ways to die

Althougha sequel, the gameplay is very different from the first. Which isnt bad by itself but it surely made this game more generic.  Its a cool little platform with some interesting mechanics and levels, its short and cheap and will fill that itch you may have for a classic platforming game
